text: Serafim Papakostas (21 January 1959 – 29 December 2020) was a Greek Orthodox prelate. He was bishop in the Metropolis of Kastoria from 1996 until his death.Εκοιμήθη ο Μητροπολίτης Καστοριάς Σεραφείμ naftemporiki.gr Retrieved 30 December 2020 Papakostas died of COVID-19 on 29 December 2020 at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Greece Category:Greek people
title: Serafim Papakostas
